  • Method Details

    • getPool

      public static com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.document.ODatabaseDocumentPool getPool(String dbURL, String user, String password, int minSize, int maxSize, org.forgerock.json.JsonValue completeConfig, boolean setupDB) throws InvalidException
      Get the DB pool for the given URL. May return an existing pool instance. Also can initialize/create/update the DB to meet the passed configuration if setupDB is enabled Do not close the returned pool directly as it may be used by others. To cleanly shut down the application, call closePools at the end
      Parameters:
      dbURL - the orientdb URL
      user - the orientdb user to connect
      password - the orientdb password to connect
      minSize - the orientdb pool minimum size
      maxSize - the orientdb pool maximum size
      completeConfig - the full configuration for the DB
      setupDB - true if it should also check the DB exists in the state to match the passed configuration, and to set it up to match
      Returns:
      the pool
      Throws:
      InvalidException

    • updateDbCredentials

      public static void updateDbCredentials(String dbURL, String oldUser, String oldPassword, String newUser, String newPassword)
      Updates the username and password for the default admin user
      Parameters:
      dbURL - the orientdb URL
      oldUser - the old orientdb user to update
      oldPassword - the old orientdb password to update
      newUser - the new orientdb user
      newPassword - the new orientdb password

    • closePools

      public static void closePools()
      Closes all pools managed by this helper Call at application shut-down to cleanly shut down the pools.

    • closePool

      public static void closePool(String dbUrl, com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.document.ODatabaseDocumentPool pool)
      Close and remove a pool managed by this helper

    • isLocalDB

      public static boolean isLocalDB(String dbURL) throws InvalidException
      Whether the URL represents a local DB
      Parameters:
      dbURL - the OrientDB db url
      Returns:
      true if local, false if remote
      Throws:
      InvalidException - if the dbURL is null or otherwise known to be invalid

    • isMemoryDB

      public static boolean isMemoryDB(String dbURL) throws InvalidException
      Whether the URL represents a memory DB
      Parameters:
      dbURL - the OrientDB db url
      Returns:
      true if local, false if remote
      Throws:
      InvalidException - if the dbURL is null or otherwise known to be invalid
